config.zipline.title: Zipline Config
config.zipline.option.snap_radius.toolti: The maximum distance from a cable to allow attachment
config.zipline.option.max_turn_angle.too: The maximum angle allowed when transitioning between connected cables
config.zipline.option.hang_offset.toolti: The vertical distance the player hangs below the cable
Whether or not zipline movement is affected by gravity
config.zipline.option.exit_jump_multipli: Multiplies the vertical jump strength when exiting a zipline. Set to 0 to disable the jump
config.zipline.option.consume_durability: If enabled, the zipline item will slowly lose durability while being used
config.zipline.option.click_reach.toolti: The maximum distance from a cable to allow manual attachment via right-click
config.zipline.option.use_anywhere.toolt: Whether or not zipline items can be used from anywhere in the world, for emoting purposes
